00008 namespace PWAS.DataAccess.SQLRepositories
00009 {
00010     public class UserRepository : PWAS.DataAccess.Interfaces.IUserRepository
00011     {
00012         private Table<User> userTable;
00013 
00014         public UserRepository(string connectionString)
00015         {
00016             userTable = new PWASDataContext(connectionString).Users;
00017         }
00018         
00019         public void AddUser(User user)
00020         {
00021             userTable.InsertOnSubmit(user);
00022         }
00023 
00024         public void SubmitChanges()
00025         {
00026             userTable.Context.SubmitChanges();
00027         }
00028 
00029         public User GetById(int userId)
00030         {
00031             if (userTable.Any(u => u.userID == userId))
00032                 return userTable.FirstOrDefault(u => u.userID == userId);
00033             return null;
00034         }
00035 
00036         public void ActivateUser(int userId)
00037         {
00038             User user = GetById(userId);
00039             user.active = true;
00040 
00041             SubmitChanges();
00042         }
00043 
00044         public void DeactivateUser(int userId)
00045         {
00046             User user = GetById(userId);
00047             user.active = false;
00048 
00049             SubmitChanges();
00050         }
00051         
00052         public void DeleteUser(int userId)
00053         {
00054             userTable.DeleteOnSubmit(GetById(userId));
00055         }
00056 
00057         public void UpdateUserRole(int userId, int newRoleId)
00058         {
00059             User user = GetById(userId);
00060             user.Role = userTable.Context.GetTable<Role>().Single(r => r.roleID == newRoleId);
00061 
00062             userTable.Context.SubmitChanges();
00063             userTable.Context.Refresh(RefreshMode.OverwriteCurrentValues, user);
00064         }
00065 
00066         public IQueryable<User> Users
00067         {
00068             get { return userTable; }
00069         }
00070     }
